grails-app.controllers.uk.co.anthonycampbell.grails.plugins.picasa
Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.controllers.uk.co.anthonycampbell.grails.plugins.picasa.CommentController

class CommentController

Comment controller Controller which handles all of the common actions for the Comment domain class. In addition, the class also provides support for ajax requests.

author:
Anthony Campbell (anthonycampbell.co.uk)

Method Detail

doList

private def doList(boolean isAjax)
Request list of tags through the Picasa web service. Sort and prepare response to be displayed in the view.
param:
isAjax whether the request is from an Ajax call.
return:
list of photos to display.

doSave

private def doSave(boolean isAjax)
Attempt to save the provided comment instance. In addition, render the correct view depending on whether the call is Ajax or not.
param:
isAjax whether the request is from an Ajax call.

doUpdate

private def doUpdate(boolean isAjax)
Attempt to update the provided comment instance. In addition, render the correct view depending on whether the call is Ajax or not.
param:
isAjax whether the request is from an Ajax call.
